meta.job_title: Manager, Customer Success Renewal Quoting Team

duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead a team of quoting analysts to execute key performance indicators and ensure compliance with company policies for renewal orders.
Support and guide the renewal quoting analyst team with quote creation, revision, and nonstandard term approval.
Establish relationships with team leads of adjacent functions, defining roles, responsibilities, and accountability to develop and streamline processes.
Assist with special projects related to the renewal quoting process and function, driving effectiveness to reduce overall time spent on tasks related to renewal quote creation/revision.
Ensure achievement of on-time, accurate, and actionable renewal quote creation, revisions, and other key metrics.

Ensure renewal pricing follows current policies, rules, and procedures based on configuration of the offering and instance, including review and accurate inclusion of historical orders and product migrations by customer.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s Degree, or 5+ years' experience in an Operations, Product, or Specialists role within a B2B organization
